title: Detection
description: Strategies for identifying if a technique has been used by an adversary. This property applies to all Technique objects across the ATT&CK framework, offering guidance on how to detect the execution or effects of the technique.
examples: Monitor system logs for unusual activity patterns, such as failed login attempts or the execution of unauthorized commands.
Use network intrusion detection systems to identify suspicious network traffic patterns associated with known adversarial techniques.
Implement file integrity monitoring to detect changes to critical system files or directories that may indicate technique execution.
